articles.title: Major step in malaria prevention as three West African countries roll out vaccine - BSI bureau
articles.description: Major step in malaria prevention as three West African countries roll out vaccine
articles.content: In a significant step forward for malaria prevention in Africa, three countries- Benin, Liberia and Sierra Leone– have launched a large-scale rollout of the life-saving malaria vaccine targeting mill… [+1901 chars]
